verses.text: Ixlajwi chi' ix q'uexxi Jesús t'a Jerusalén, ix b'at yilan jun sq'uinh eb' yetisraelal.
Ha t'a yol chonhab' Jerusalén chi', t'a slak'anil jun puerta b'aj tz'och nok' calnel, ata' ay jun tanque scuch Betesda t'a sti' eb' israel chi'. Oye' val stentail.
Tzijtum eb' penaay ayek' ta. Ay eb' max yal yilani, ay eb' max yal sb'eyi, ay eb' sicb'inaqueli.
Ay jun winh 38 ab'ilxo penaay.
Axo ix yilan Jesús jichanek' winh. Yojtac to pecatax icha chi' yaj winh. Yuj chi' ix sk'anb'an t'a winh: --¿Tzam a nib'ej tzach b'oxicani? xchi t'a winh.
Ix yalan winh penaay chi': --Mamin, malaj mach tzin ak'anem t'a yol ha' tik ayic tz'ib'xi ha' t'a juntac el. Ayic tzin nib'ej tzin emi, ch'ocxo eb' sb'ab'laj em t'a vichanh, xchi winh t'a Jesús.
Yuj chi' ix yalan Jesús t'a winh: --Q'ueanh vaan, ik'chaanh a vaynub' tik, b'eyanh, xchi t'a winh.
D'a jun rato chi', ix b'oxi sk'ool winh. Ix yik'anchaanh svaynub' winh chi', ix syamanoch winh sb'eyi. Palta sk'ual ik'oj ip.
Yuj chi' ay jayvanh eb' aj Judea ix alan t'a winh: --Ha ticnaic, sk'ual ik'oj ip. Manh sleyaloc tzik'chaanh a vaynub' tik, xchi eb' t'a winh.
Ix tak'vi winh t'a eb' icha tik: --Ha jun winh in ak'an b'oxoc, a winh ix alan t'ayin: Ik'chanh a vaynub' tik, tzach b'eyi, xchi winh, xchi winh.
Ix sk'anb'an eb' t'a winh: --¿Mach jun winh ix alan chi' t'ayach to tzik'chaanh a vaynub' tik, tzach b'eyi? xchi eb'.
Palta manh yojtacoc winh tas sb'i jun ix ak'an b'oxoc sk'ool winh chi', yujto ix satb'at Jesús chi' t'a skal jantac anima ayek' chi' ta'.

Axo t'a junelxo ix ilchaj winh yuj Jesús t'a yamaq'uil stemplo Dios, ix yalan t'a winh: --Inai ach b'oxi. Manhxo a k'ulej chukal, yic manhxo ol ja junocxo yaelal más te niwan t'a ib'anh, xchi t'a winh.
Yuj chi' ix b'at winh yal t'a eb' winh aj Judea chi' to a Jesús chi' ix ak'an b'oxoc sk'ool winh.
Yuj chi' ix te och eb' winh ajk'olal t'a Jesús chi', yujto ha t'a sk'ual ik'oj ip ix sk'ulej juntzanh chi'.
Palta ix yalan Jesús t'a eb': --Ha in Mam smunlajnhej. Yuj chi' anheja' tzin munlajnhejpaxi, xchi t'a eb'.
Yujto ix yal juntzanh chi' Jesús, ijanxo val sgana eb' smilchamoc. Manhocnhej yuj b'aj max sk'anab'ajej sk'ual ik'oj ip chi', palta yujto slajb'ej sb'a yet' Dios ayic syalanoch Dios chi' Smamoc.

Ix yalanxi Jesús t'a eb': --Val yel swal t'ayex, a in tik Yuninal in Dios, max yal in k'ulan junok tas t'a yol vico', anhej tas svil sk'ulan in Mam tzin k'ulej. Ha jantacnhej tas sk'ulej in Mam chi', a tzin k'ulejpaxi.
Ha in Mam chi', te xajan in yuj a in Yuninal in tik. Ha jantacnhej tas sk'ulej, sch'oxpax t'ayin. Ayto val juntzanhxo tas te niwan ol sch'oxo', ol te sat e k'ool eyilani.
Yujto a in Mam chi' tz'ak'an pax pitzvoc eb' chamnac, syak'an sk'inal eb'. Ichinpaxta' a in Yuninal in tik svak' sk'inal eb' in gana svak' sk'inal.
Ha in Mam chi', max sch'olb'itej junok anima. Palta a in Yuninal in tik, ix ak'ji vopisio in ch'olb'itan yaj eb' anima smasanil,
yic wach' lajan tz'aj vik'jichaanh icha tz'aj yik'jichaanh in Mam chi' yuj masanil anima. Tato ay eb' malaj tzin och t'ay, anhejtona' malaj tz'ochpax in Mam t'a eb', yujto a checjinac in coti.

Val yel swal t'ayex, a eb' tz'ab'an in lolonel, syak'anpaxoch jun in checancot eb' t'a sk'ool, ay sk'inal eb' t'a junelnhej. Manhxo ol b'atcan eb' t'a syaelal, yujto toxo ix colchajel eb' t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, ix schaan sk'inal eb'.
Val yel swal t'ayex, a ticnaic toxo ix ja stiempoal yab'an in jaj eb' chamnac a in Yuninal in Dios tik. Ha eb' tz'ab'ani, ol scha sk'inal eb' t'a junelnhej.
Yujto a in Mam aj q'uinaltaxon t'a yol yico'. Yak'annaccan jun chi' t'ayin to aj q'uinal in paxi.
Yak'annacpaxcan vopisio in ch'olb'itan masanil eb' anima, yujto Ak'b'il in cot yuj Dios voch animail.
Manh eyak' sat e k'ol yuj juntzanh swal tik, yujto ay jun pekti’ ol javok, a val eb' mucanxo ol yab' in jaj eb'.

Ol laj q'uex vaan eb' b'aj mucan chi'. Ha eb' wach' syutej sb'ha t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol pitzvocxi eb', ol schaan sk'inal eb' t'a junelnhej. Axo eb' sk'ulan chukal, ol pitzvocxi eb', palta ol b'atcan eb' t'a syaelal t'a junelnhej.

Ha in tik, malaj jab'oc tas syal in b'oan t'a yol vico', tzin ch'olb'itej icha tas schec in Mam chi' in k'ulej. Tzin ch'olb'itej t'a stojolal, yujto manhoc tas icha in gana tzin k'ulej, palta icha sgana jun checjinac in coti, aton in Mam.
Tato munil svala' to ay vopisio, malaj yelk'och jun wik swal chi'.
Palta ay junxo tz'alani tas vopisio. Ha jun chi', vojtac to te yel syala'.
Ha ex tik xid' e chec k'anb'aj t'a winhaj Juan tas yopisio winh. Ha tas yalnac winh vuuj, te yel.
Palta a in tik, max vak'ochlaj yipoc in k'ool tas syal junok anima vuuj. Tonhej svec e nacoti tas yalnaccan winhaj Juan chi' t'ayex, yic tzex colchaji.
Ha tas ix yal winhaj Juan chi', lajan icha junok tas tz'ak'an sakil k'inal ayel yoc. Yuj chi', ix ex te tzalaj jayeoc k'ual eyab'ani.

Palta ay junxo ek'al yelk'och t'a winhaj Juan chi'. Ha sch'oxaneli tas vopisio, yujto a juntzanh tas syak' in Mam in k'ulej, a tzin k'ulej. Icha chi' tz'aj scheclajeli to a in Mam chi' checjinac in coti.
Ha in Mam chi', a checjinac in coti, a syak' testigoal sb'a vuuj. Ha ex tik, malaj b'aj ix eyab' sjaj sloloni. Malaj b'aj ix eyil juneloc.
Max eyak'och slolonel t'a e k'ool, yujto max in eyak'och t'a e k'ool a in checb'il in cot yuj tik.
Ha ex tik scham val e sayan eyil t'a Slolonel Dios Tz'ib'ab'ilcani, yujto a e naani to icha chi' ol aj yilchaj e q'uinal t'a junelnhej. Palta wach'chom syal vab'ixal Slolonel Dios chi',
malaj e gana tzex ja t'ayin yic tze cha e q'uinal.
Malaj yelk'och t'ayin tato syal wach' lolonel eb' anima vuuj.
Vojtac tas yaj e pensar, manh xajanoc Dios eyuuj.
Ha in tik, ak'b'il in cot yuj in Mam, palta max in e cha'a. Tato ay junocxo munil ol javok t'a yol yico', a jun chi' ol e cha'a.
¿Tas ol aj in eyak'anoch t'a e k'ool, yujto anhej t'a eyichanh junjun ex e gana ay eyelk'ochi, malaj pax e gana ay eyelk'och t'a yichanh Dios te yel?
Xe natalaj to a in ol val t'a in Mam chi' tas e chukal. Palta a winhaj Moisés ol alanoc, aton winh tze tz'ac eyak'och t'a e k'ool.
Tato tzeyak'och t'a e k'ool tas stz'ib'ejnaccan winhaj Moisés chi', tzam in eyak'ochlaj t'a e k'ool, yujto a winhaj Moisés chi' tz'ib'annaccan vab'ixal.
Palta tato max eyak'och tas stz'ib'ejnaccan winh chi' t'a e k'ool, ¿tas ol aj eyak'anoch t'a e k'ool tas swal tik t'ayex? xchi Jesús t'a eb' winh aj Judea chi'.
